text: Bɨlel yad nɨbi pel gɨtep gɨpɨm takaw ak Taytus nop agɨl, yɨb nɨbop ak dad aplanɨnek. Pen takaw nop agɨnek anɨb ak nebeŋ ma dɨpin. Takaw nɨbop agɨnok okok, mɨdupsek nɨŋɨd yɨbɨl agɨnok. Pen takaw Taytus nop agɨnok ak, yɨb nɨbop dad aplanɨgun agɨl anɨb agɨnok ak, anɨb ak tek nep nɨŋɨd yɨbɨl agɨnok.
